alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 11:42PM EDT until June 17 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Mobile County in southwestern Alabama... Northwestern Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Western Escambia County in south central Alabama... Northwestern Escambia County in northwestern Florida... * Until 1130 PM CDT. * At 1042 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Uriah to 11 miles northeast of Calvert to Citronelle to 6 miles west of Deer Park, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Prichard, Saraland, Bay Minette, Atmore, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Creola, Chunchula, Stockton, McCullough, Stapleton, Axis, Mount Vernon, I65 And I165, Bratt, I65 And CR 1, I65 And AL 21, I65 And AL 225, I65 And AL 158 and Movico. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
